page.title: 03 SHOPS
page.content: There are twelve shops in Gortin but the main ones are Mc Connell's,Mc Swiggan's and Mc Keown's.Mc Connell's sells grociers,papers and hardware.Mc Swiggan's sells grociers and papers.Mc Keown's sells grociers and hardware. There is a shop called O Neil's which sells musical insturments, electrical gadgets and sweets. There are three more Mc Connell's in Gortin.The first sells tiles, the second is a pharmacy and the third sells hardware. There is a restaurant and a cafe in Gortin.The cafe has slot machines and a pool table.It sells sweets and meals. The other two shops in Gortin are the butcher's and the baker's.
